CustomField.formula: IF( Active__c = True && ISPICKVAL( Post_Secondary_Enrollment_Status__c , 'Earned sec dipl. & enrolled PSE (UB/EOC)'), 'Goal # achieved' , IF( Active__c = True && ISPICKVAL( Obj_A_Secondary_School_Diploma__c, "Rec'd secondary school diploma/equiv."),'Goal # not achieved','' ))
CustomField.label: DB - EOC - 6A Support
